entry.title: Tahoe Premium Heavy Duty Nylon Waterproof Western Saddle Cover with Six Elastic Holding Straps and Stirrup Covers - Fits Most Saddle Sizes and Types
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tahoe Tack
Type: Carry Bags and Covers
Price: 17.99

Tahoe Tack Premium Nylon Western Saddle Cover

This saddle cover keeps your western saddle free from dust and scratches! Waterproof nylon with 1" wide 6 elastic straps to hold skirts and fenders. Great for protecting and transporting your equipment!

Key Features & Item Specifications

  • DURABLE DESIGN - this saddle cover is made from a durable, thick nylon and is designed to keep your saddle free of dust and scratches. It features six 1” wide elastic straps to secure the cover to your saddle’s skirting and fenders
  • PROTECTS YOUR SADDLE - this cover protects your saddle from damage due to dust/debris, scratches, moisture, sun bleaching, etc. Our innovative design covers your entire saddle from horn to the stirrup and the cover is securely held in place
  • WATERPROOF - our saddle covers are waterproof, meaning that your saddle will be protected from rain, leaks in the barn, etc. These covers are great for water protection during transport or at shows as well
  • MULTIPLE COLORS - these western saddle covers are available in five colors: Black, Hunter Green, Pink, Red, and Turquoise
  • FITS MOST SADDLES - this western cover is sized generously and will accommodate almost any size and style of western saddle

entry.title: Back Open Western Boot Carry Bag 3 Layer Padded Paris Tack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Paris Tack
Type: Boot Carry Bags
Price: 32.95

This boot bag, designed in the USA with an open back, allows for easy handling. Made of a durable waterproof nylon shell with double zippers and soft lined nylon shell for added protection.

Size: 16" X 14" X 9.5"
  • Reinforced top for additional support and to prevent sagging
  • 4 plastic feet on the bottom to keep bag off of ground
  • Padded handle for carrying comfort
  • 16" tall but would fit 15" or less best

entry.title: Tahoe Durango Premium Western Halter, Bridle/Headstall Carry and Storage Bag
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tahoe Tack
Type: Bridle / Halter Carry Bags
Price: 39.95

Our Durango series features top of the line carry bags complete with a three-layered waterproof nylon design with foam padding and a soft no-rub interior, and hand-tooled basket weave leather accents with sunrise spots. Bridle bag only. Bridle is not included.
  • PREMIUM DESIGN - our Durango series features a top of the line three-layered waterproof design with foam padding and a soft no-rub interior designed to keep your bridles and halters looking perfect.
  • GENUINE LEATHER ACCENTS - this carry bag is accented with hand-tooled basket weave leather on the corners of a high-class, classic western look.
  • PADDED THREE LAYER CONSTRUCTION - our Durango series is made of a 600D waterproof nylon outer shell, filled with foam padding, and then lined with a soft, silky 70T nylon lining.
  • SUNRISE SPOTS - all the leather accents on this carry bag feature a border of sunrise spots- decorative metal accents that are shaped like little flowers.
  • NOT JUST FOR BRIDLES - this carrying bag is also perfect for pleasure driving harnesses, headstalls, halters, reins, and many other types of tack, as well as for dog harnesses/leashes, etc.
  • Dimensions: 27 1/2" Long, 13" Wide, and 4 1/2" Deep
  • 3 interior nylon loops designed hold up to 3 Bridles

entry.title: Tahoe Durango Premium Padded Waterproof Nylon Western Boot Carry Bag
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tahoe Tack
Type: Boot Carry Bags
Price: 49.95

If you’re looking for an attractive but functional way to store and transport your favorite pair of boots, then look no further! Our Durango series premium western boot carry bag was designed to be a display-worthy option for the discerning boot owner who is looking to protect their boots. These carry bags weren't just designed to look attractive, but to also hold up strong! They feature a three-layer waterproof construction that is composed of a soft, no-rub 70T nylon lining, a layer of protective foam padding, and a 600D waterproof nylon outer shell. If you’re looking to protect your favorite pair of boots from dust, debris, rodent damage, scratches and scuffs, sun damage or fading, or damage from rain and snow, look no further! Our Durango carry bag offers an attractive, yet practical and durable, solution.

 

Product Features

PREMIUM DESIGN - our Durango series features a top of the line three-layered waterproof construction designed to fully protect and shelter your boots, with added leather and sunspot accenting.

HAND-TOOLED LEATHER ACCENTS - this carry bag is accented with high grade, hand-tooled basket weave leather on the corners which give a high-class, classic western look to this stylish carry bag.

PADDED THREE LAYER CONSTRUCTION - our Durango series is made of a 600D waterproof nylon outer shell that is filled with foam padding and then lined with a soft, silky 70T nylon lining for ultimate protection.

FITS MOST BOOTS - this boot carry bag is sized generously and is designed to accommodate almost any western boot.

MATCHING CARRY BAGS AVAILABLE - our full Durango line was designed to match for an attractive, cohesive look. If you love this Western boot carry bag, be sure to check out our garment, halter/bridle, and western saddle carry bags!

 

Dimensions

Top Length: 9”

Top Width: 8”

Front Length: 18”

Bottom Width: 15”

Back Height: 16”

entry.title: Tahoe Tack Durango Premium Padded Waterproof Nylon Western Saddle Carry Bag with Hand-Tooled Leather Accents
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tahoe Tack
Type: Saddle Carry Bags & Sets
Price: 109.95

The Durango premium western saddle carry bag is the ideal storage solution for the person looking for an attractive, display-worthy saddle cover/carry bag that is sure to wow, while also keeping your saddle clean and fully protected. These carry bags weren't just designed to look attractive, but to also hold up strong! They feature a three-layer waterproof construction that is composed of a soft, no-rub 70T nylon lining, a layer of protective foam padding, and a 600D waterproof nylon outer shell. If you’re looking to protect your favorite saddle from dust, debris, rodent damage, scratches and scuffs, sun damage or fading, or damage from rain and snow, look no further! Our Durango carry bag offers an attractive, yet practical and durable, solution.

 

Product Features

PREMIUM DESIGN - our Durango series features a top of the line three-layered waterproof construction designed to fully protect and shelter your saddle, with added leather and sunspot accenting.

HAND-TOOLED LEATHER ACCENTS - this carry bag is accented with high grade, hand-tooled basket weave leather on the corners which give a high-class, classic western look to this stylish carry bag.

PADDED THREE LAYER CONSTRUCTION - our Durango series is made of a 600D waterproof nylon outer shell that is filled with foam padding and then lined with a soft, silky 70T nylon lining for ultimate protection.

FITS MOST SADDLE TYPES AND SIZES - this western saddle carry bag is sized generously and is designed to accommodate almost any style and size of western saddle up to 19” in seat length.

MATCHING CARRY BAGS AVAILABLE - our full Durango line was designed to match for an attractive, cohesive look. If you love this Western saddle carry bag, be sure to check out our boot, garment, and halter/bridle carry bags!

 

Dimensions

Spine Length: 34”

Drop: 39”

Skirt Drop: 18”

Fender Width: 16”

entry.title: Tahoe Tack Triple Layer Padded Western Boot Carry Bag
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tahoe Tack
Type: Boot Carry Bags
Price: 34.95

Tahoe Tack Triple Layer Western Boot Carry Bag

Keep your cowboy boots damage free during frequent travel with this triple layer, padded boot bag designed by Tahoe Tack. The soft nylon inner lining gently keeps your boots clean and shiny, while the heavy duty outer shell protects against any unwanted elements such as dirt, dust and water. The foam support walls absorb any shock that may occur during travel. Features a padded, adjustable nylon shoulder strap for comfort and a buckle so the bag can be hung in various locations during travel. Additional nylon carry handle on the top of the bag with soft rubber grip. The inside of the carry bag features a wall divider to keep your boots separate, preventing damage caused by them colliding inside the bag. Thick layer bottom with support grips.

Key Features & Item Specifications

  • Soft nylon inner lining and heavy duty, waterproof nylon outer shell.
  • Foam support walls to absorb shock.
  • Wall divider inside bag to keep boots separate
  • Features padded, adjustable nylon shoulder strap for comfort.
  • Additional nylon carry handle on the top of the bag with rubber grip.
  • Reinforced bottom with four rubber grips.
  • Each bag features a two tone, fashionable color design.

entry.title: Tahoe Premium Western Saddle Carry Bags 3 Layers Padded
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tahoe Tack
Type: Saddle Carry Bags & Sets
Price: 59.95

Great for protecting your favorite Western Saddle! The waterproof nylon exterior, foam padding and nylon lining are sure to protect your saddle while traveling to a show.
  • Removable, adjustable padded shoulder strap
  • Unzips completely to accommodate your saddle
  • Nylon with foam padding and nylon lining - 3 layered quality product
